ch.epfl.lasec.mova
Class DenialProtocol

java.lang.Object
  ch.epfl.lasec.mova.DenialProtocol
All Implemented Interfaces:
InteractiveProof
public class DenialProtocol
extends java.lang.Object
implements InteractiveProof

Class used to implement the denial protocol. The two main methods are implementing the prover and the verifier side of the protocol.
For more information on the protocol, refer to the coGHIproof in MOVA.

Author:
Sebastien Duc
